name: Power Up
effect_text: Choose one attribute roll (+2) for a model.

name: Counter Strike
effect_text: As defender, take Fight Action against a Charging Model

name: Overwatch
effect_text: After a target moves, make a single Shoot action against it.

name: Stabilize
effect_text: Reduce 1 Horror from a model within 1 M.

name: Dodge
effect_text: After a Shoot action is declared against a model, move it 1 M.
limits: If target leaves LoS, action is lost.

name: Regroup
effect_text: Add 2 to next Initiative roll for the player.

name: Shield Wall
effect_text: Give all allies within 1 M of Leader +1 AC until your next activation.

name: Command Inspire
effect_text: One ally may immediately take a free Move or Recover Horror action.
limits: Must be in LoS of the leader or designated commander.

effect_text: One model makes a Fight or Shoot action at +1 Damage or +1 AP.
limits: Model gains 1 Horror token. Once per round.
